echo "Auger ID: $AUGER_ID" set dz = `${param_dir}/dz.csh ${ebeam}` set ne = `${param_dir}/ne.csh ${ebeam}` set ebeam = `${param_dir}/ebeam.csh ${ebeam}`
ln -s ${egs5_dir}/data ln -s ${exe_dir}/src/esa.inp pgs5job.pegs5inp
tar -xf tritrig.tar ls -v tritrig_*.lhe.gz | xargs zcat >! egs5job.inp echo "18${num} $dz $ebeam 500000" >! seed.dat ${exe_dir}/lhe_v1.exe cat egs5job.out
${stdhep_dir}/add_mother brems.stdhep tritrig.stdhep ${stdhep_dir}/beam_coords tritrig.stdhep rot_tritrig.stdhep -s 19${num}
source ${slic_dir}/init_ilcsoft.csh source ${slic_dir}/geant4/build-9.6.p01/geant4make.csh ${slic_dir}/geant4/build-9.6.p01
set seed = 20 set nevents = 0 while ( $nevents < 10000 ) rm out.slcio echo "slic -i rot_tritrig.stdhep -g ${det_dir}/${detector}-${ebeam}/${detector}-${ebeam}.lcdd -o out.slcio -d$seed{${num}} -r5000000" slic -i rot_tritrig.stdhep -g ${det_dir}/${detector}-${ebeam}/${detector}-${ebeam}.lcdd -o out.slcio -d$seed{${num}} -r5000000|grep -vE '^$|^>>>> .+Event <[0-9]+>$| has [0-9]+ hits$' ls -l /apps/scicomp/java/jdk1.7/bin/java -Xmx100m -jar ${hps-java} -r /org/lcsim/hps/steering/DataQuality.lcsim -i out.slcio >! data_quality.txt set nevents=`grep '^Read.*events$' data_quality.txt | cut -d' ' -f2` echo "$nevents events in output" @ seed = $seed + 1 end
